Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Partly \Part"ly\, adv. In part; in some measure of degree; not wholly. ``I partly believe it.'' --1 Cor. xi. 18. [1913 Webster]
partly adv : in part; in some degree; not wholly; "I felt partly to blame"; "He was partially paralyzed" [syn: {partially}, {part}] [ant: {wholly}]
